item.description:
One thing I love about scootering is what I call "carving". Carving is primarily leading via GPS and seeking out and finding great roads in uncharted (by me) territory. The NW Mass Loop as this ride is titled will attempt to follow the roads laid out in the Google map below, however there are always variables such as road surface and or tasty little roads that lead off from our path - these kinds of rides are never a disappointment and further to broaden our knowledge and skill as devout scooterists.

No doubt there will be ample scenic beauty to take in and stops for food, coffee, and picture taking - yes I will be stopping to take photos from time to time - nothing is worse than getting home and wishing you had a photo of that beautiful vista, so bring your cameras and take in the scenery with me!

Stats: 220 mi ? about 5 hours 42 mins not including stops

Depart from Concord at 8, get home before sundown. If the morning is warm, I'd like to start earlier.

Sunrise: 4:30AM Sunset: 7PM

This ride is open to all paid touring members

http://maps.google.co...
item.name: NW Mass loop
